objects.text:
• 925 Sterling Silver
• Rose Gold Plated
• Elegant Wreath Design
• Gift for Special Occasions

With Certificate of Authenticity
and 6 Month Warranty

product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*
product_details.description: Product Dimensions: 1.27 x 1.3 x 1.27 cm; 3.9 g. Item part number: ER0583. Country of Origin: India. Department: womens. Item Weight: 3.9 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 13 x 13 x 13 Millimeters. Net Quantity: 2.00 Count. Generic Name: Stud Earrings. Customer Reviews: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 64 ratings.

banner_details:
This elegant and feminine banner is divided into four quadrants using soft, pastel background tones. The top-left quadrant features a bold brand name (`heading`) in a strong sans-serif typeface and a scripted subheading (`subheading`) describing the product. The top-right quadrant highlights a central product image (`product_image`) of rose gold earrings, placed against a delicate blush background. The bottom-left quadrant contains key product features (`description`) using bullet points, pricing information (`price`), and a call-to-action button (`cta` on `cta_background`). The bottom-right quadrant includes a credibility message (`tagline`). Subtle decorative elements, including soft circular graphics and curved lines, enhance visual appeal without distraction.

**Color Palette:**
- Rose Pink: `#D47D7D`
- Soft Blush: `#FFDFDF`
- Pale Pink: `#FFE8E8`
- Light Peach: `#FFF5F5`
- Deep Rose: `#B65454`
- Warm Brown: `#8B4949`
product_color: The product image showcases a pair of elegant earrings featuring a refined blend of soft rose gold and sparkling crystal elements. The primary color is a gentle **rose gold (#F4A6A6)**, which forms the base and structure, adding a warm, luxurious appeal. This is beautifully contrasted by clear, brilliantly faceted **white diamonds (#FFFFFF)** and **crystal-like silvers (#DDE6EA)**, which add shimmer and sophistication. The colors are delicately blended, with rose gold settings enveloping the crystals to make them stand out while maintaining harmony. Ideal banner palette includes rose gold, crystal white, soft blush pink (#FAD4DA), and light peach (#FAD1BD) for an elegant, luxurious ad.
